remarks: Define a filter base ` F ` generated by a metric ` D ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Nov-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
statement:
metust.1 $e |- F = ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) $.
metustel $p |- ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) -> ( B e. F <-> E. a e. RR+ B = ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) ) $.
$d B a $.

$d X a $.
